verses.name: 2 Chronicles 6:10
verses.text: The Lord therefore hath performed his word that he hath spoken: for I am risen up in the room of David my father, and am set on the throne of Israel, as the Lord promised, and have built the house for the name of the Lord God of Israel.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 6:11
verses.text: And in it have I put the ark, wherein is the covenant of the Lord, that he made with the children of Israel.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 6:12
verses.text: And he stood before the altar of the Lord in the presence of all the congregation of Israel, and spread forth his hands:
